description: Unlicensed Chinese GBC game.

name: Sega Master System Brawl
description: SEGA Master System Brawl is a Genesis/Megadrive homebrew which pits more than 14 classic SEGA Master System characters against each other.

name: Blank Blood
description: Exploratory platform game of ryona style.

name: Maze of Flott
description: Strange car maze arcade game.

name: Rayer Shoot
description: Vertical scrolling shooter.

name: Mario vs. Donkey Kong
description:
A remake of the first game in the Mario vs. Donkey Kong series, originally released for the Game Boy Advance. In this puzzle-platformer, the player controls Mario in a quest to recover the Mini Marios kidnapped by his eternal rival, Donkey Kong.

Run, jump, and backflip your way to rescuing the stolen Mini-Mario toys in this puzzling twist on Mario action. Obstacles like spikes, moving platforms, and falling bricks stand in your way—put your brain to work and figure out the best way to reach the Mini-Marios.

name: Robbeary
description:
Robbeary is an arcade adventure in which you help Bertie Bear rob a vast store. The store has 24 floors and each floor is bristling with guards.
Bertie can climb ladders and jump from one floor to another but he must avoid being caught by the guards because capture means instant death.

Bertie must collect all the fruit on each level before a key unlocking the door to the next floor is revealed. At some levels he may come across another key which opens a door where extra fruit can be collected.

name: We Were Here Expeditions: The FriendShip
description: Partner up with your friend online and test your friendship by solving puzzles together in an abandoned amusement park. Work together to overcome brain-teasing challenges in this standalone We Were Here experience.

name: Simple DS Series vol. 39: The Shouboutai
description: Firefighting Simple DS Series game.

name: Spy x Anya: Operation Memories
description:
Play as Anya and experience the world of SPYxFAMILY in its first console-game! Anya Forger has received a new assignment from school: create a photo diary of memories.

On weekdays, head to class in the morning, then enjoy family time in the evening.

On weekends, visit all sorts of exciting places, like the beach or art museums, in search of subjects worthy of photographing!

What kind of photo diary will you help Anya create?

name: Another Code: Recollection
description: The Nintendo DS game Trace Memory and its Wii sequel are coming together, fully enhanced, on the Nintendo Switch system. A young girl named Ashley receives a letter from her father, who she thought had passed away. Seeking answers, she sets off for a solitary island in search of him. Once there, Ashley encounters puzzles and obstacles that threaten to hinder her investigation. Find the traces of her past and experience the full story for the first time.

name: Pinball Champ '95
description: Pinball gambling game.

name: SaGa: Emerald Beyond
description:
The latest standalone entry in the SaGa franchise arrives in 2024, bringing together the very best elements of the beloved series to offer each player their own unique gameplay experience.

Make use of Glimmers and United Attacks in battle; meet a diverse cast of races including monsters, mechs and vampires; and experience your very own story, created through your choices and actions.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Tomb Raider I•II•III Remastered
description:
Discover Lara Croft’s Original Adventures, Lovingly Restored

Play the Original Three Tomb Raider Adventures: For the first time ever, play the complete experience with all expansions and secret levels on modern platforms in this definitive collection.

Included Game Titles
Tomb Raider I + The Unfinished Business Expansion
Tomb Raider II + The Gold Mask Expansion
Tomb Raider III + The Lost Artifact Expansion

name: Contra: Operation Galuga
description: The legendary Contra series is back! Contra: Operation Galuga is a modern reimagining of the classic run-‘n’-gun action game from the ’80s, featuring modern graphics and sound. Encounter new stages, new play mechanics, an updated weapons system and explosive co-op combat for up to two players in Story Mode or four players in Arcade Mode.

name: F-Zero 99
description:
A battle royale game featuring tracks from the original F-Zero for Super Nintendo Entertainment System.

Line up with 98 other F-Zero machines and race to the finish in this thrilling take on the original Super NES game. Keep an eye on your power meter as you boost and bash, because speed is just as important as survival. Defend yourself with a Spin Attack and collect Super Sparks to breeze past the competition on the elevated Skyway.

Outpace and outlive your opponents in rotating modes

The core F-Zero 99 mode is just one way to race at breakneck speeds. Mini Prix and Grand Prix modes appear on a set schedule and challenge you to compete and qualify in a series of races. Team Battle and the extra-tough Pro Tracks mode rotate throughout the day. Prepare yourself in Practice Mode and race against your ghost.

name: Bandle Tale: A League of Legends Story
description: Bandle Tale: A League of Legends Story is a crafting RPG set in the whimsical world of Bandle City. After a party goes wrong, the portals that connect your home collapse and throw everything into chaos! Using your knitting magic and backpack house, restore the portals to reunite Bandle City.

name: Eastward: Octopia!
description: Sam and John return in an all-new adventure! In this heartwarming story-driven farming sim, players can grow crops, tend livestock, and turn an abandoned fairground into a thriving village, with the help of the weird and wonderful cast of beloved Eastward characters.

name: Among Us: The Fungle
description: This free update adds a new map with new tasks such as dicing vegetables and roasting marshmallows.

name: Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door
description:
A remake of the second game in the Paper Mario series, originally released for the Nintendo GameCube.

Turn the page and join Mario and friends in an RPG adventure to discover the legendary treasure behind the ancient Thousand-Year Door. Will Mario complete his papery quest, or will he crumple under the pressure?

name: Magical Warrior Diamond Heart
description: Magical Warrior Diamond Heart is an in-progress otome visual novel created by Dreamy Pyon. This game is inspired by magical girl anime. Play as Valerie Amaranth and decide the fate of the world, eat delicious donuts, and even smooch lots of cuties! Will Val defeat the Nightmares, make new friends, and perhaps find the love of her life along the way? Or will she meet her tragic end? Your choices decide her fate and the fate of humanity in this magical visual novel! The game features a diverse cast of characters from varying racial/ethnic backgrounds and LGBT+ dating options.

name: Stray Children
description: Stray Children is a bittersweet fairytale RPG, created by many of the same people behind beloved cult-classics like Chulip, Little King’s Story, Rule of Rose, Super Mario RPG, and, of course, Moon: Remix RPG Adventure.

name: Another Code: Two Memories
description: Travel to the remote Blood Edward Island as Ashley, a 13 year old girl in search of her father in Another Code: Two Memories. Ashley receives a letter from her father who she believed to be dead, setting off a chain of mysteries and visions into the past. Investigate your surroundings and locales while solving puzzles to reveal the truth in this refreshed retelling of the original Trace Memory game for the Nintendo DS system.

name: Eclosion
description: A 2D vertical scrolling shooting game. A predecessor to Precious Star.

name: Another Code: R - A Journey into Lost Memories
description: A remake of the Wii original for Nintendo Switch

name: Tomb Raider
description: A remaster of the original Tomb Raider, including The Unfinished Business expansion as well as the ability to toggle between original and remastered graphics.

name: Tomb Raider II
description: A remaster of the original Tomb Raider II, including The Gold Mask expansion as well as the ability to toggle between original and remastered graphics.

name: Tomb Raider III
description: A remaster of the original Tomb Raider III, including The Lost Artifact expansion as well as the ability to toggle between original and remastered graphics.

name: Kryptonite: Flamez Hedgehog
description: Published in 2003, Kryptonite: Flamez Hedgehog was a fangame based on the Sonic the Hedgehog series.

name: Impetus
description:
Released as part of LUDUM DARE #27, whose theme was "ten seconds", IMPETUS was a short-lived collaborative game in which players across the world worked together around the clock to keep a doomed astronaut alive for as long as possible.

A player visiting the game's page would be presented with a picture of the unnamed unconscious woman, and a countdown indicating how long she had yet to live. Any player clicking the prominent "click to keep alive" button would result in the countdown being reset: by working together, by ensuring that the button was pressed at least once every ten seconds, players could attempt to keep her alive.

The game was victim of its success: after almost 12 hours of runtime, the traffic to the site reached such levels that it became inaccessible for more than ten seconds, resulting in the death of the character. The site remains accessible, but the game is no longer playable and only displays the end screen.

name: Manic the Lad: Rage Against the Maniac
description: Here is the video game “Manic the Lad: Rage Against the Maniac”! Released in 2003 on Windows, it's still available and playable with some tinkering. It's an action game, set in an arcade, platform and fan made themes.

name: Neo Sonic: God Speed 2
description: 2005, the year Neo Sonic: God Speed 2 was released on Windows. Made and self published by Manic Team, this action game is available for free.

name: 007: Sonic Secret Agent
description: 007: Sonic Secret Agent is a video game published in 2003 on Windows. It's an action game, set in an arcade, platform and fan made themes.

name: Neo Sonic 3
description: Published in 2003, Neo Sonic 3 (aka Neo-Sonic 3: Revelations, Neo-Sonic 3: Armageddon) was an above-average platform title in its time.

name: Neo Sonic 2
description: 2000, the year Neo Sonic 2 was released on Windows. Made and self published by Manic Team, this action game is available for free.

name: Mr Stumps Dentures
description: 2004, the year Mr Stumps Dentures was released on Windows. this action game is available for free.

name: Open Sonic the Hedgehog
description: Open Sonic is an open-source game based on the "Sonic the Hedgehog" universe. It introduces a different style of gameplay called cooperative play, in which it's possible to control 3 characters simultaneously. Unlike most similar games, Open Sonic provides a greater level of interaction between the player and the levels. It's more than just a jump'n'run; the user must come up with some strategy in order to get through the levels.

name: Sonic 2099
description: 2002, the year Sonic 2099 was released on Windows. Made and self published by TGF Team, this action game is available for free.

name: Shin-chan: Shiro and the Coal Town
description:
Shin-chan’s pet dog Shiro will be the key character in this game, as it will lead its master to ride a mysterious train that stops in a steampunk-themed coal mine town. The game will then task the player to guide Shin-chan in navigating the town and help its facility owners improve their businesses while carefully monitoring a suspicious group plotting around the town.

Shin-chan will also be able to return to his family who are staying in the village near his father’s hometown during the adventure. He can also do activities like fishing and bug-catching in the village.

name: Last Warrior
description: In this game you will be able not only to plunge into the middle ages, to feel as a brave warrior, but also to have a good time.

name: Survival Quiz City: Festival Edition
description:
A new free-to-play version of Survival Quiz City on the Nintendo Switch in Japan and releasing as a new app on Steam without English support, the original Steam release will be shutdown. The game will still have the same game systems as the original along with the new city festival, including various themed events

Player data from the original release on Steam can be transferred starting October 1st until it is shutdown on October 31st and will include some some bonus draw tickets in the new game but it is set to be in Japanese only.

name: The Phone Rings
description: It has been a bad week!

name: Resident Evil 4: Separate Ways
description:
The mission requires secrecy. Failure is not an option.

Play as Ada Wong in this additional scenario and experience the events of Resident Evil 4 from her perspective, filling in unanswered questions posed in the main story.

In addition to the action available in the base game with Leon, a grappling gun can be used to get to various locations, as well as take down enemies from a distance and launch a ranged melee attack. This allows for a more exciting and fast-paced gameplay experience.

name: Tales of Arise: Beyond the Dawn
description: The new expansion pack taking place a year after the war between Dahna and Rena.

name: The Bones of You
description: Sin descripción

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms 8 Remake
description: Theater of war, infinite drama. A masterpiece of historical simulation, "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS 8" is revived after 20 years! Enjoy the greatest military drama in the series, with the largest number of officers and scenarios, including an improved "All Officers Play" feature.

name: Comfort Zone
description: spaces that exist for the sake of existing

name: Fitness Boxing feat. Hatsune Miku
description:
A continuation of the Fitness Boxing series with Hatsune Miku as the main instructor along with Rin and Evan from Fitness Boxing to fully support the different game options.

The game has the normal modes from the previous games along with the new "Mixercise" mode that uses songs from past games along with original songs different characters including Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len and Megurine Luka.

Hatsune Miku has costume options in-game and Piapro is looking for more songs, costumes and illustrations to use as part of the collaboration.

name: Hop! Step! Dance!
description:
A spin-off of the Fitness Boxing series, Hop! Step! Dance! is a dancing lessons game teaching players different movement and choreography with a 30-step course covering 84 lessons created by a professional dancing instructor.

The game has 2 new instructors for the main lessons with 2 additional instructions, Rin and Hiro from Fitness Boxing 2, as part of the practical "free" and "stretch" modes. The free mode has 6 original dances with speed settings and practice options for the different parts.

name: Football Manager 2024 Touch
description: Progress never stops when you’re pursuing footballing greatness. Gameplay upgrades empower you to develop a blueprint for success on and off the pitch.

name: Hook & Kaiju
description:
Maneuver the airship and hook the Kaiju’s body to make it lose balance and fall over. As the newest member of the airship unit, lay siege on the Kaiju and defend the towers at all costs!

The first release from the 2022 New Hire Onboarding Program at Bandai Namco Studios!

name: Nakwon: Last Paradise
description:
Nakwon is a 3-person view Zombie Apocalypse Stealth Survival game.
Experience a new form of 'Post-Apocalypse Life' that you've never seen before.
Explore 'Extraction Survival' and gather resources from the PvPvE City, a place where Zombies and Survivors coexist to survive in this new societal structure.

name: Final Fantasy VII Rebirth: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Content of the Digital Deluxe Edition:
・ Final Fantasy VII Rebirth main game
・ Digital art book
・ Digital mini soundtrack
・ Summon Materia: Magic Pot
・ Accessory: Reclaimant Choker
・ Armor: Orchid Bracelet

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Final Fantasy VII Rebirth: Deluxe Edition
description:
Content of the Deluxe Edition:
・ Final Fantasy VII Rebirth main game
・ Mini art book
・ Mini soundtrack
・ Steelbook

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Final Fantasy VII Rebirth: Collector's Edition
description:
Content of the Collector's Edition:
・ Final Fantasy VII Rebirth: Deluxe Edition (includes: mini art book, mini soundtrack, steelbook)
・ Sephiroth Static Arts figure
・ Moogle Trio Summoning Materia (DLC)
・ Magic Pot Summoning Materia (DLC)
・ Accessory: Reclaimant Choker (DLC)
・ Armor: Orchid Bracelet (DLC)
・ Armor: Midgar Bangle Mk. II (DLC)

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Final Fantasy VII Remake & Rebirth: Twin Pack
description: This is a combined set of Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade and Final Fantasy VII Rebirth, the two first entries in the trilogy of the Final Fantasy VII remake project.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Final Fantasy VII Remake & Rebirth: Digital Deluxe Twin Pack
description:
Digital Deluxe Twin Pack Contents:
・ Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade main game
・ Final Fantasy VII Rebirth main game
・ Digital art book
・ Digital mini soundtrack
・ Summon Materia: Magic Pot
・ Accessory: Reclaimant Choker
・ Armor: Orchid Bracelet

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Pack: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate - Psychedelic
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Air Attack 2
description: Take a 5 minute break to de-stress with this high-intensity, ultra simple, retro arcade shooter! Take down airplanes. Dig tunnels. Hide and seek shelter. Try and beat the highscore. That's all. Afterwards, you will go back to your life with renewed energy of body and mind.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Additional Episodes Pack
description: Obtain Additional Episodes Pack for use with One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4.

name: Super Mega Baseball 4: Castillo Arena Stadium
description: Perched high above the waves, a centuries-old fort stands guard over an epic stadium known as Castillo Arena. But as players smash dingers over the historic ramparts and the fans yell their battle cries, the real battle is waged on the diamond.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - The Battle of Onigashima Pack
description: This exciting fourth character pack brings three more playable characters to the game! Enjoy even more intense Pirate Warriors action by controlling three characters key to the climax of the Land of Wano arc!

name: Construction Simulator: SANY Pack
description:
Looking for new heavy construction machines to expand your company? Check out the SANY Pack with its 15 brand-new machines from the renowned Chinese manufacturer SANY covering different fields of application. Be prepared for any challenges that may arise on the construction site!

• SANY STR130C-8S – Vibratory Asphalt Compactor
• SANY SSR120C-8 – Vibratory Single Drum Soil Compactor
• SANY SY305C LC – Medium Hydraulic Excavator
• SANY SY500H (Tier 4F) – Large Hydraulic Excavator
• SANY SY155W – Wheeled Hydraulic Excavator
• SANY SYL956H5 – Wheel Loader
• SANY SMG200C-8 – Motor Grader
• SANY SAP60C-8 – Asphalt Paver
• SANY SRT45 – Articulated Dump Truck
• SANY SAC1300T2 – Small Mobile Crane
• SANY SAC4500 – Large Mobile Crane
• SANY SCM2000C-8 – Cold Planer
• SANY SR155 – Rotary Drilling Rig
• SANY SY35U (Tier 4i) – Compact Excavator
• SANY SFT100 – Tower Crane

name: Inside
description: Inside immerses you in a mysterious forest where shadows and whispers toy with your psyche. As you delve deeper, the line between reality and illusion blurs, with only a flashlight guiding your path in this psychological horror journey.

name: Satellite Odyssey: Prologue
description: Satellite odyssey: Рrologue - is a short first-person story-driven adventure with horror elements. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of classic science fiction and retro futurism, inspired by Soviet sci-fi films. Your partner is the artificial intelligence "Zarya"

name: Something In The Well
description: Something stirs in the backwoods of Montana. You can hear it trying to get in. All you have is your trusty dog and a camcorder. A short 5-10 minute game with 2 endings.

name: Cthulhu Tower
description: Cthulhu Tower is a dark twist on classical tower defense genre where you try to protect your eldrich world from cruel crowds of humans!

name: Machi Koro With Everyone
description: "Machi Koro With Everyone" is the definitive edition of the “Machikoro” series developed as a digital and online version by Grounding, the developer of “Machikoro”! ! Let's enjoy "Machikoro" with everyone online!

name: Dirty Aim Trainer VR
description: Dirty Aim Trainer is designed to make transitioning from no VR FPS mechanics to a more experienced VR player. Review your stats, custom playlist fit to your weaknesses, up to 25+ levels & 15+ playlist, and a leaderboard with the top players and inclusive settings to make training fit your style.

name: Kiyo
description: Sneak, fight and sabotage an evil bunny corporation in this stealthy platformer. Join a resistance group of animals trying to get their home planet back from the paws of evil rabbits. Master stealth, swing with ninja ropes, crack tricky puzzles and enjoy satirical humour!

name: Slayin DX
description: Run through wave after wave of monsters with your weapons, spells or mounts in this endless single screen arcade game.

name: Mad King's Lair: Tome of Destruction
description: A Time Traveling, Story-Driven, Fully Voiced, Action RPG in the style of the Legend of Zelda Majora's Mask and Dark Cloud. This tool filled, NPC Driven Exploration and Puzzle game will keep you unlocking secrets for 80+ hours of whimsical, family friendly adventure!

name: Grim Prix
description: Grim Prix is a multiplayer vertical race where paladins compete from point A to point B in a given racing track in a frenetic melee combat against other players and enemies (NPCs) in a quest for gems to achieve Divine Enlightenment at the finish line by using multiple gadgets and tricks.

name: Run 'n Gun: Deluxe
description: Welcome to a world that is full of danger, and your task is to destroy all enemies on your way in the original Run and Gun style!

name: Hero's Delirium
description: Hero's Delirium is a co-op medieval fantasy RPG. Where you or three other players play through a campaign, or explore the open world. In this adventure, you will save the world from the mind controlling tyranny.

name: Seraphim
description: Embody Archangel Raquel, plumbing the depths of the purest angels' impure past. Chase a thought-dead foe through impossible labyrinths in this fast-paced, tightly-wound Celestian speedrunning platformer.

name: Kanji Kitchen: Learn Japanese
description: Welcome to Kanji Kitchen! A unique fusion of cooking and language learning. From mochi-making to mastering Hiragana, Katakana, 2000+ Kanji, and the most essential words, your kitchen is your classroom.

name: Girls and Robots
description: This game is a survivors rougelike game.World is lost by monsters and bugs. Player can pick three diferent girls and robots, to make a special team.They will face thounds monsters and bugs, fight, live, evolution and find the trueth of the lost world.

name: The Ghosts of Terinor
description: The Ghosts of Terinor have recently gained the ability to drain magical powers. As expected your ability to throw fireballs was confiscated by them almost immediately. Use your dual enchanted blades to regain your mojo!

name: Elysium
description: Embark on an adventure that brings you to a mysterious island where lies the ruins of an ancient civilization. Build, fight, survive and discover how a newly discovered element on the island that gave Elythians a technological advantage also destroyed them.

name: Black Runes
description: Black Runes is a horror game with first-person puzzle elements, in which you have to play as a person caught in a hopeless situation, shrouded in magic.

name: Glais Gawizt
description: Glais Gawizt is team-based action gameplay. This game has features like customization your character or adding equipments and skills to it's gameplay.

name: Matrix Bullet
description: This is a cyber 2D bullet-plume dodging game in which players aim to clear the screen by continuously dodging the oncoming bullets.

name: Going Down
description: Descend into the haunting depths of the human psyche in this horror RPG adventure.

name: Restricted Area
description: This game is a large team shooting game. The game supports the first person and the third person. In the future, intelligent robots generate autonomy in the process of self-iteration, and they decide to overthrow human domination. The player will play the role of a human soldier defeating a robot.

name: ShelfLife: Art School Detective
description: ShelfLife: Art School Detective is a Mystery Adventure featuring a cast of loveable weirdos! Befriend and investigate 7 potential suspects. Use psychic powers to astral project into their artwork and learn their secrets. Unmask the mysterious ART KILLER that’s terrorising your campus!

name: Spring Hell
description: Just Press Spacebar at the right time! It’s very simple arcade game with tiny puzzle and platformer.

name: Hidden Cats in Spooky Town
description: It's Helloween Time! Do you choose Trick or Cat? Enjoy and find all the hidden cats one by one on the Spooky Town to reveal the final colored art. Play through different modes, find special cats, and unlock bonus levels! More than 700 hidden objects to find!

name: Morph Animals
description: Morph into creatures, conquer Morph Animals World, and let the adventure begin!

name: Short Night
description: In Short Night:The Half Pint Lady choose between four horny goblin coworkers while keeping The Half Pint Lady from falling into disrepair. Complete unique quests, find hidden items, explore each goblin’s unique personality during the day and tackle increasingly difficult mini-games at night.

name: Moonring
description: A dark fantasy, turn-based, retro-fusion of classic turn-based RPGs and roguelikes, all presented with a unique neon aesthetic.

name: Lost Princess
description: Play this walking simulation. Collect items and try to find missing Princess in big open world

name: Alphadia I & II
description: The legends of energi once again in a new edition! Step into the enchanting world of Alphadia, a revitalized epic fantasy RPG series that merges the first two titles, 'Alphadia I' and 'Alphadia II', into a single, captivating adventure.

name: Jimmy's Agony
description: in time between 1940's to 1960's, we live the Tommy JR Story while he is seeking something he want, is he a good guy? bad guy? it doesn't matter, he will get what he want.

name: Assemble
description: Assemble is a creative sandbox VR game. Build anything and everything. Glue, snap, and pivot to make things that function like in real life. Share your creations with your friends. Easily bring your imagination to life.

name: Liberators' Chronicles
description: Liberators' Chronicles is an exciting turn-based strategy game that will take you to the South American independence campaigns. Liberate an entire continent from the yoke of the Spanish crown as you command brave revolutionary leaders and their armies.

name: Cannibal Island: Survival
description: A ship was violently tossed and turned until it was shipwrecked on an isolated island shrouded in mystery. The island was inhabited by a cannibalistic tribe that had long been cut off from the outside world. Patiently waiting for new prey.

name: New World: Rise of the Angry Earth
description: A new threat looms over once-familiar lands. Wield a new weapon, new ability, and new allies in the form of rideable mounts to fight a growing menace that threatens to consume all of Aeternum!

name: W.A.N.D. Project
description: Fast-paced, roguelike bullet hell with deep, unique spellcrafting. Create and use overpowered, game-shattering spells by combining a multitude of magical elements. Defend Tokyo from a monstrous invasion using magic, reflexes, and game-changing combos.

name: New Ganymede
description: New Ganymede: an upcoming free-to-play open world indie sci-fi fantasy MMOARPG extravaganza where you can run, glide, shoot, slash, dash, roll and generally panic your way through co-op PVE with friends in a beautiful narrative driven world developed by an Australia-based team.

name: Survival Nexus
description: Survival Nexus is an exhilarating survival game that immerses players in a post-apocalyptic world filled with challenges and dangers.

name: Virtual Love Secrets
description: A visual novel a little unusual, which not only the decisions you make change the course, but each game will be personal.

name: Lost Hope: Backrooms
description: Lost Hope, a chilling singleplayer horror game set in the eerie Backrooms universe, challenges players to delve into enigmatic locations teeming with bizarre and inexplicable phenomena.

name: Seed In
description: Seed in is a vibrant, 2D, puzzle game that challenges you to dig your way out of ingenious and fun levels! Along the way, you’ll enjoy a relaxing, adorable, and quirky story with memorable and lovable characters!

name: Echoes of Etheria
description: A Text-Adventure/Metroidvania set in a post apocalyptic city shrouded by an endless storm. Features turn-based combat, character leveling, weapon upgrades, and more! Explore the ruined city of Etheria, fight back against its deadly inhabitants, and find a way to put an end to the storm!

name: Xanthaphobia
description: Xanthaphobia presents an immersive experience that blends elements of puzzles, mystery, and horror.

name: JJJ
description: "A normal vacation" the three friends were thinking, when they were drawn into a macabre ending.

name: Hypogean Descent
description: A first Person Lovecraftian Survival Horror game, inspired by the work of HP Lovecraft. Explore uncharted subterranean territory, document your findings and survive the horrors that you uncover.

name: Game Collector
description: Embark on an exciting journey to become the ultimate game collector in this simulation and resource management adventure! Beat minigames for money, relax by playing your games, and focus on balancing money and fun. Begin your journey to become a legendary game collector!

name: Command: Showcase - Operation Desert Falcon
description: The year is 2027 and France's position in the Sahel has become untenable. A coup d'état in Chad has brought an anti-colonial regime to power. Militant groups are seizing foreign assets and government security forces have gone over to the United Sahel Liberation Front.

name: Rusty Ride
description: Take the wheel as a gritty veteran in a jetpack-equipped car with a tank cannon. Traverse dynamic, procedurally generated landscapes, obliterate obstacles, and unlock explosive upgrades. A thrilling, action-packed adventure awaits!

name: Drunken Way to Home
description: You've drunk too much... Let's go home while being aware of the dangerous around you! Drunken movements are fully simulated with physical calculation. Enjoy your drunkenness.

name: Project Cartaphilus
description: Sin descripción

name: NFL Pro Era II
description: Show off your QB skills in the latest NFL-licensed VR experience, NFL Pro Era II. Suit up in the new multi-player where you and your friend, or a player from around the world, can compete online against each other. This year, it’s all about you. Are you built for it?

name: Welcome Teacher
description: This is a horror RPG Maker MV game. Explore the quiet countryside shrouded in darkness, and uncover the hidden secret of terror that lies behind it.

name: Lair of Torment
description: This is an indie horror game with first-person puzzles. Terror and fear have enveloped the city. The maniac Orun has returned. You sneak into his lair to try and stop him before he goes too far.....

name: Dog Years
description: Intrepid explorers embark on a perilous space expedition to save their dying civilization by securing vital resources. They are accompanied by 5P4RKY, an android dog, but trouble ensues as the journey begins.

name: Swordplay: Karakuri - Strange Tale
description: "Swordplay～Karakuri～Strange Tale" is a Japanese-style 3D action game set in a world where advanced "karakuri" technology is prevalent. Players can enjoy a slapstick drama in a world inspired by both "karakuri" mechanisms and the late Edo period.

name: Plant Therapy: Queens
description: Plant Therapy: Queens is full of new content to make your cozy Plant Therapy experience even more plantastic! Features a new apartment with stunning city views, new plants and artwork and upgraded watering can and fertilizer options.

name: ZXC
description: In a small notebook, an abandoned character was drawn without any story. For a long time, the character lived lonely and trapped in the notebook, but one day, the character gathered courage and decided to escape the notebook.

name: Roulette Simulator 2024
description: Roulette Simulator 2024 presents players with the greatest modern Roulette gambling simulation. Experience the highs and the lows in real time as you try to beat the roulette wheel during the intensity of each spin!

name: The Snow Reach
description: "The Snow Reach!" is a highly customizable CCG tactical strategy game. You can combine various unique abilities to create your own personalized followers. The game focuses on Roguelike elements and player versus player battles.

name: Riot of Willy
description: Is a horror game with an adventure twist. Your task is to solve puzzles and not to get caught by monsters. They all hear and see you, so be careful. Explore the locations and survive in this thrilling horror game

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Portugal
description: Puzzles of Portugal!

name: Altiverse
description: As one of the remaining survivors of the collapse, take your final stand and rebel against the AI and their creations who control, manipulate, and rule the Altiverse, before it’s too late...

name: Frog And Roll
description: You have been turned into a frog by a druid. Roll around in this stylized platform game as a frog!

name: RedMask
description: Sin descripción

name: Saga
description: Help Saga in her quest for revenge. A Viking girl who has lost everything to evil will embark on an epic journey to find answers and put an end to the hordes of enemies ravaging her land.

name: Kamla
description: Play as an Indian exorcist who is tasked with banishing the evil spirit that’s taken over a newly-wed woman named Kamla, in this first person horror game inspired by Indian traditions and folklore.

name: Legendary Slide 2: Platinum Edition
description: Clear away the tiles, solve over 80 unique Mahjong puzzles and collect gems to restore ancient temple of Air and continue your journey through the Legendary world of Legendary Slide II.

name: Chiyo
description: Chiyo is a first-person hardcore escape room horror game set in Japan's Edo era. As Idate Chiyo, a paranormal investigator possessing supernatural abilities, you are tasked with investigating an abandoned mansion and unveiling a family's dark history and it's ultimate secret.

name: The Last Librarian
description: Fight tons of robots, upgrade your abilities and explore an abandoned artificial planet with your jetpack in this non-linear shoot'em up adventure! Play as Gabriela Xanchez, a galactic government agent sent to investigate a dying world and find the last paper book in the galaxy.

name: Dark City Trouble Nights
description: Sin descripción

name: Hexarium
description: A minimalistic traffic management game where you build and maintain a bustling road network to keep markets and homes connected and traffic flowing smoothly.

name: 9th Sentinel Sisters
description: The battle of the clone girls unfolds on a post-apocalyptic Earth, devastated by the alien life form known as "Bleed." Pilot the manned weapon "Father" to eliminate enemies. Upgrade weapons, create powerful builds, and strategize to successfully clear stages.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Ultimate Edition
description: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 is the latest evolution of Pirate Warriors action! Based on the concept of 'experiencing a real One Piece battlefield,' buildings will come crashing down during the action and attacks will throw up smoke and dust, placing you in the thick of the One Piece world!

name: Booze Masters: Freezing Moonshine
description: Freezing Moonshine is a unsettling first-person adventure game with elements of plant cultivation, puzzles, and lots of high-proof beverages. To survive, you'll need to gather harvests, take photos, and craft a wide variety of spirits.

name: Gunbrella: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Dagon: The Railway Horror
description:
Have you ever wondered what the master of weird fiction and cosmic horror might have dreamt about?

Now you have the opportunity to immerse yourself in one of H. P. Lovecraft’s nightmares, which he described in 1927 in a letter to Donald Wandrei - a co-founder of the famous Arkham House publishing house.

So validate your ticket and find a comfortable seat - the motorman will be arriving shortly.

name: BazookaCat
description: simple 2d shooter game for playdate

name: The Incident
description: This is a techbase themed map for Doom 2, where you are sent to Mars Base Rama to investigate an incident in subsector B3. The base personnel has vanished and in its place you encounter hordes of hellish demons. What happened?

name: Icarus: Arcticus Outpost
description: High in the mountains, on terraced cliffs or a large flat frozen lake give you a range of altitudes in which to build your perfect winter retreat.

name: BattleCross
description: Unique fast-paced card battle where each players takes turn controlling the shuttlecock's position and speed with cards, until one side fail to receive. The basic concept of the card battle is simple enough to understand without prior badminton knowledge, but deep enough to provide challenge for anyone who loves CCG and deck building card games.

name: Sticklings Deluxe
description:
Sticklings Deluxe is a unique puzzle game with the mission to lead a herd of Stickmen into their goals by using various abilities. Like a lemming, a Stickling just walks and walks and it is your objective to correctly assign the correct task to a Stickling to lead all the others the correct path. Abilities include blocking, self destruction, jump, bomb throwing, rush and bridge building. Try to earn as much gold, silver and bronze medals as possible. Oh, and by the way, if you fail there is always the option to nuke them!
More than 40 awesome handcrafted levels are waiting for you in this arcade puzzle game

name: My Type!
description:
How fast can you type?
In "My Type!" your typing skills are put to the ultimate test. Write words to remove them before they fill up the board. Some words like "Explode" might have special effects, giving you an extra tool to bring you out of a tricky situation.
"My type" is the perfect game to improve your typing skills and learn how to text faster in a fun and engaging way. It's available in multiple languages to help as many people as possible have fun and improve.

name: Past Memories
description: The game tells the story of a woman who has to face all the important memories of her life by going though several distorted stages full of enemies, which symbolize the fragments of her past that have come back to haunt her. Our heroine must try to survive those nightmarish worlds by evading the enemies chasing after her and overcoming all the obstacles that stand in her way. She cannot fight back, she can only flee. But with the clever handling of dimension changing, and the several resources she is provided with, she can hold the monsters back and get to the end safe.

name: Waddle Wars: Roguelike Defense
description: Get ready for a cozy adventure in "Waddle Wars" by Cozy Labs! Play as the hero penguin in a unique blend of tower defense and roguelike gameplay as you defend your castle from waves of cute yet pesky invaders. But that's not all - after each wave, select from 30+ different perks to upgrade your defenses. Summon guards, upgrade your castle, level up your hero, and more. Complete quests to unlock new hero skins and compete for bragging rights on the local and multiplayer high score tables.

name: Dunk The Hoops: Bouncy Ball
description: With simple one tap gameplay which is easy to learn but hard to master. Bounce around and try to slam dunk as many hoops as you can.

name: Word Spell Game: Yes or No ?
description:
"Word Spell Game: Yes or No? – Experience the Ultimate Word-Spelling Challenge! Welcome to a world where precision meets speed in our dynamic Spelling Adventure game. Explore two thrilling modes: Category Mode and Survival Mode.
Category Mode: Dive into a variety of word categories, from animals to technology. Test your word wisdom and showcase your spelling mastery. Each round presents a new challenge, keeping your mind engaged and vocabulary enriched.
Survival Mode: Brace yourself for an adrenaline-packed test of your spelling skills. With only 10 seconds on the clock, you must swiftly decide whether the word is spelled correctly or not. The challenge intensifies with every correct answer, pushing your limits in this battle of wits.

name: Stretch Text: Find Proverb
description: Embark on a word adventure like no other! 'Stretch Text: Find Proverb' challenges your perception and word skills in a captivating twist on word puzzles. In this unique game, words are stretched and concealed, waiting for your keen eye to reveal their secrets.

name: Coolson’s Chocolate Alphabet
description:
It was a rainy day when you finally found a job packing chocolates at Coolson’s factory. The days are all rainy around here. But it’s a tough job market for an English major, and you take what you get. So it’s piece work for the immediate future.
Each of those perfect little boxes, just waiting to be filled with shiny letter-embossed chocolates; it’s a pity to just toss them in without any thought. Wouldn’t it be better, wouldn’t it be beautiful, if all the boxes spelled out words? Careful, though. It wouldn’t do to get yourself fired by wasting time, or by wasting chocolate. You’ve got to be quick. You’ve got to be clever. You’ve got to play the game.

name: Pokémon
description: Pokémon is a browser based mobile game by McDonald's made as a part of their Pokémon TCG 2023 Happy Meal promotion.

name: The Daily Diaonal Sudoku
description: It's just like standard sudoku, but with diagonals! Each row, column, nonet, and diagonal must include exactly one copy of each number 1 through 9.

name: Popeye
description: The object of the game is to collect hearts and deliver them to Olive Oyle to keep her 'lovemeter' topped up. Points are scored for hearts delivered. Bluto, UFO's, witches etc try to stop you. Some hearts are behind locked doors so you've got to find the right key to open the door and get them while others can be grabbed simply by jumping up to get them. Somewhere there's a fruit machine for which you need to collect 'spin' items.

name: Ghostbusters II
description:
Ghostbusters II is a 1990 action game for the NES, developed by Imagineering and published by Activision. It is based on the 1989 film of the same name, and was released in the United States in April 1990, followed by a United Kingdom release in March 1991.

In Europe and Japan, HAL Laboratory released its own Ghostbusters II game called "New Ghostbusters II".

name: City Siege 2: Resort Siege
description:
With its cute, cartoony visuals, throbbing music track and fast-paced action, City Siege 2: Resort Siege is a wild ride through the world of special ops and hostage rescue.
Your task is to walk around the streets, kill all enemies, save all VIP's and other civilians, collect stars and use them to upgrade your units.

name: Rally Ar
description: Argentinian Rally Simulator.

name: City Siege 3: Jungle Siege
description:
Prepare your trigger finger and delve into the explosive warzone of City Siege 3: Jungle Siege. The Baddies are back with vengeance, and this time they've set their bloodthirsty sights on a pristine, dangerous jungle.
Eliminate all enemies, rescue hostages, collect stars and promote your troops for higher health.

name: Chuzzle Snap
description:
The Chuzzles are back, with a twist!

Snap and match colorful Chuzzles and watch them shiver and explode with happiness! It's easy to learn, easy to play, but hard to master! Collect trophies to show off your skill, and coins to buy up pet Chuzzles and their toys!

If you've enjoyed Chuzzle or Chuzzle 2, you'll definitely enjoy this game-- it's a snap!

name: City Siege 4: Alien Siege
description: City Siege 4: Alien Siege is the fourth installment of the popular, fun-addicting shooting game. You are on a mission on a far away planet. Take your awesome laser gun and build upgradeable troops in order to battle all enemy alien units and rescue the last human survivors.

name: City Siege Sniper
description:
City Siege is back with a sniper edition! Use stealth to distract some baddies, or use your sniper rifle to pop a bullet in their head. Be sure to save the hostages with minimal casualties, and don't forget to upgrade your guns!

City Siege Sniper takes certain elements of a puzzle game and combines them with a shooter game across its 25 original and brand new levels.

name: Automaton
description: Automaton is a highly focused modpack intended to encourage factory building and automation using large multiblock machines.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Enchanted Adventure
description: This update for Dreamlight Valley adds a Beauty and the Beast Realm to the game, two new characters (Belle and the Beast), new quests for The Forgotten, the Haunted Holiday Star Path and the return of Halloween Dreamlight Duties.

name: Games for Stream!
description: An exhilarating chat interactive game, where the chat becomes your co-pilot, shaping the course of the game in real-time. Engage with your favorite streamers and viewers like never before as you type commands, make choices, and influence the game's outcomes directly through chat.

name: State of Decay 2: Curveball Update
description:
How do you meaningfully add to a game that’s been in players’ hands for five years? In the case of State of Decay 2, you throw a curveball. Although this is the 34th update for State of Decay 2, Curveball represents a significant overhaul. This new update, coming to players for free on September 18, is a landmark moment for the game – not just offering a swathe of new content for the game’s most dedicated players and newcomers alike, but marking a new era in State of Decay 2’s development through the work of Wushu Studios.

Wushu, from Liverpool, England, will continue providing support to State of Decay 2 as much of original studio Undead Labs transitions to work on the next entry in the series – but where you might expect that support to be incremental, Wushu is making a very big splash. Curveball is a major update, touching almost every element of the game, and designed to consistently offer brand new challenges, even to those who have been playing State of Decay 2 since release.

Available after the fifth in-game day, curveballs can change the world around your settlement in some very interesting ways. Housed in a new menu, curveballs will periodically appear – each with their own narrative attached – offering new objectives, rewards, enemy types and much more. Curveballs can be positive (like finding increased loot) or negative (like buffing regular zombies in multiple ways); they can be timed or objective based; they can affect enemies, your survivors, or other NPCs. Effectively, any element of the game you may have gotten comfortable with can, and often will, change.

name: Resident Evil 4: The Mercenaries - Separate Ways Update
description:
A free update for The Mercenaries mode released alongside the Separate Ways expansion that added 4 new characters and the Docks stage, unlocked after beating the Island stage once.

Ada Wong is available by default while Albert Wesker is unlocked with an A rank on any stage using Ada. The update also added 2 variant characters with Leon (Pinstripe) and Ada (Dress) unlocked with an S rank or higher on all stages using their base character.

name: Endrays
description:
Wield a piercing laser without inhibition at the tip of your fingers - your mouse.
Indulge in Endrays, a devastating weapon of mass destruction, and drive the resistance of humanity into merciless extinction.
What awaits you when this battle comes to an end...?

The second release from the 2022 New Hire Onboarding Program at Bandai Namco Studios!

name: Final Fantasy XI: Rhapsodies of Vana'diel
description: Released across the May, August, and November 2015 version updates, Rhapsodies of Vana'diel is designed to be the conclusion of the main scenario missions of Final Fantasy XI, tying together plotlines and characters from across the game's previous stories. Completing the missions requires registration of and progression through all previous expansion packs. Other additions include the new areas Escha and Reisenjima and new trusts.

name: Fawning Over a Corpse
description: "Nothing is wrong with my deerly beloved; she's just hungry."

name: Final Fantasy Sonic X: Episode 1
description: The first installment to the FFSX series.

name: Excycle
description:
Drag your friends into this mischievous four-player unicycle racing game!
Get your unicycle rolling with the mouse wheel and cruise your way through hazardous obstacles and racetracks, all while ramming into your rivals!
Push, shove, and kick up a fuss in EXCYCLE!

The third release from the 2022 New Hire Onboarding Program at Bandai Namco Studios!

name: T-Racer
description: Sin descripción

name: Pokémon: Close Combat
description: A Fast Paced, 2D Pokémon Fighting Fangame, where you duke it out in local or online matches as your favorite fighting type Pokémon from across the series!

name: Inferno Meltdown
description:
Take on the role of a firefighter in this delightful and adrenaline-pumping action game. Extinguish hazardous fires that threaten civilian populations and property.
Explore offices and townhouses, save people under the roof before it takes fire, or dare to rescue a warehouse stocked up with radioactive wastes.

name: Hololore: Amethyst
description: 3 idols journey through friendship and misunderstandings.

name: Shigeru Planet
description:
A boisterous and bizarre commotion! Overrun the planet with chatter-plants!
Propagate these eccentric yet endearing chatter-plants, only if you dare! Operate a UFO and strive to spawn as many of them as you can before time runs out. Revel in the outlandish frenzy that can only be experienced here on Shigeru Planet!

The fourth release from the 2022 New Hire Onboarding Program at Bandai Namco Studios!

name: Kokoro no Pro
description: A pro wrestling-themed visual novel!

name: BS Super Aleste
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Freaks 1 Remastered
description: Super Freaks 1 Remastered is a remastered version of The Search of Tikiman made to celebrate the original game's 10th anniversary. It also served as a soft reboot of the series and introduced the modern characters/designs.

name: Chordosis
description: Chordosis invites you to experience a unique cosmic survival sci-fi horror game centered around alien abductions. Immerse yourself in the small village of Dunahont, Hungary, and uncover its chilling mysteries.

name: Heart Cage
description:
You are a detective who has just moved to a new town. You are involved in a serial killer case, and three mysterious residents (Or more?!) are approaching you!

Don't trust anyone! But... can you?

name: OhMyWitch!
description:
It is the first year I have had the chance to join the Halloween parade. But why the monster kidnapped me to the other world?! And this charming monster wants me to be his Witch. What do you think I should do?!

On the other hand, I also met the cat I lost. But why did he suddenly become a human?!

name: Lilith Hall
description: 080 is the pride of Lilith Hall. She does exactly as she's told, she get's perfect grades, and she's never lost a single battle. All her life she was taught the only thing that matters is her future Ringmaster; but when an outsider is brought in, she gets a taste of what the outside world looks like. She must choose between a temptation she's never known, or the life she's always wanted.

name: Arena
description:
"Arena" is a game developed by Tom Madens for the "Net Yaroze", a PlayStation development kit and manufactured by Sony Computer Entertainment as a promotion to computer programming hobbyists.

It was featured on Official UK PlayStation Magazine's demo disc #108.

name: Dynamite Bomber
description:
A challenging platform game from Limenko that has many different stages and bosses including a giant robot on the moon.
Dynamite Bomber was produced by Limenko in 2000.

Limenko released 5 different machines in our database under this trade name, starting in 2000.

Other machines made by Limenko during the time period Dynamite Bomber was produced include Happy Hunter, Battle Bubble, Legend of Heroes, and Techno X.

name: Dito G1
description: Sin descripción

name: Hard Brain
description: Cyberpunk-themed turn-based strategy game.

name: Koma
description: Koma, or Beigoma, are a kind of traditional Japanese wooden spinning top. In this game, you play as one in the odd situation of having to collect exclamation marks while trying to stay to moving platforms above an endless black void. Each stage has a different set of platforms, and though they move in the same patterns every time, the exclamation marks appear in random positions.

name: The Comedian Adventure
description: A minimalist one-button platform game for Net Yaroze.

name: Anda
description: Net Yaroze Shooting game.

name: Dance Of Death
description: Polygonal top-down beat'em up game for Net Yaroze.

name: My Flower
description: Homebrew Net Yaroze game for PlayStation 1.

name: Burning Angels
description: Low-budget action fighting game.

name: Olteus II
description: Olteus II is an Action game, developed by WinkySoft and published by Brother Kougyou, which was released in Japan in 1991.

name: Minion Quest: The Search for Bowser
description:
This adventure, included in Mario & Luigi: Superstar Saga + Bowser's Minions, develops alongside and with the main Mario Bros. story. It involves Bowser's minions battling the enemies of the Beanbean Kingdom to rescue Bowser, after he is knocked out from the Beanbean Border, led by Captain Goomba.

The game needs to be unlocked during the plot of Superstar Saga, being available within the Superstar Saga menu screen and new episodes are unlocked according to the player's progression through the main quest.

name: Final Justice
description: Japanese indie beat'em up for PC.

name: Guitar Jam
description: Namco arcade cabinet released in 1999, only in Japan. Distinctive for its guitar-centric gameplay and controller, Namco was sued by Konami over its striking similarities to GuitarFreaks and most cabinets were converted. It is considered extremely rare to find an unaltered Guitar Jam cabinet in the modern-day, much less a working one.

name: Bowser Jr.'s Journey
description:
A new story added in Mario & Luigi: Bowser's Inside Story + Bowser's Journey. This new addition to the main story sees Bowser Jr. as the titular character. While Bowser is occupied during the main story, this story sees Bowser Jr. on an adventure to cure the blorbs himself after it causes numerous minions to balloon up to an immobile state.

Different from its predecessor (Minion Quest: The Search for Bowser, included in Mario & Luigi: Superstar Saga + Bowser's Minions), it doesn't need to be accessed from within Bowser's Inside Story.

name: Payday 3: Silver Edition
description: Payday3 is the much anticipated sequel to one of the most popular co-op shooters ever. Since its release, Payday-players have been reveling in the thrill of a perfectly planned and executed heist. That's what makes Payday a high-octane, co-op FPS experience without equal.

name: Million Hits
description: 'Million Hits' contains a whopping 100 songs, widely ranging from J-Pop to Enka! With iconic hits, you can play all your favorite songs. This game also adds the latest hits and popular songs every month, so even the heaviest music nerd can enjoy these songs with ease. Player requests can be added to the game, and the most requested songs at the end of the week and month respectively will be added to the game! You can also jam with another player, alternating or harmonizing for a karaoke-like experience!

name: Touhou Gensou Eclipse
description: Touhou Gensou Eclipse is an official Touhou Project secondary creation nurturing shooting RPG.

name: Lifeless Horizon
description: In this intense and thrilling zombie survival game, players must use their wits and quick reflexes to stay alive in a world overrun by the undead. With limited resources and endless hordes of zombies, players must scavenge for supplies, build their defenses, and work together with other survivors to stay alive. But beware, as danger lurks around every corner and any misstep can mean certain death. Will you be able to survive the zombie apocalypse?

name: Grinlox is here
description:
You want to go to work, but a nasty surprise awaits you there.
This game was created with GameGuru MAX.

name: Super Peko 35
description: A 2D pixel shooter hololive fan game!

name: SkibidiVerse
description: SkibidiVerse is a captivating game where you will take on the role of the camzeraman tasked with saving the planet.

name: SpongeBob’s Idle Adventures
description: Join SpongeBob & his friends on a F.U.N. idle adventure through dimensions!

name: Dicey Dungeons: Halloween Special
description: Dicey Dungeons: Halloween Special is a extra levelpack containing three episodes. Halloween Special sees Warrior, Inventor and Witch back into a new horror themed dungeon, with three new enemies, returning enemies with new costumes, two new locations, and new scary music.

name: Sudoku G1
description: Every day, a new challenge for you to challenge your brain while having fun!

name: Caravan Boomer
description:
Caravan Boomer is a new shooter in development for MSX2, It uses PSG and MSX-MUSIC sounds.
the game has 2 modes: caravan (time attack) and normal.

name: Mixed Feelings 2: Elysium
description: Upon meeting Ezra, Zale, and Dandy, you discover that you don't remember who you are, where you came from, or why you're even there. The story unfolds as the residents of the town try and help you remember, and you learn what it truly means to be yourself.

name: Demon Castle
description:
Demon Castle is a Castlevania-style game for PICO-8

An evil sorcerer is trying to summon an ancient demon into the world. You are the only one who can travel to the sorcerer’s castle and prevent him from completing the summoning. Best of luck.

name: Akumajyo Dracula Peke
description:
Akumajyo Dracula Peke is a hidden minigame that came included with Castlevania: Rondo of Blood. It is also known as Stage X "The Fate of Blood Must be Cut with the SUPER CD-ROM² ROM" (血の因縁はSUPER CD・ROM²でなければ断てない, Chi no Innen ha Super CD-ROM² ROM de Nakereba Tatenai). This minigame played instead of Rondo of Blood if the user was using the wrong kind of System Card.

The game has been included in all conversions of Rondo of Blood, only differing on the methods of unlocking it between platforms.

name: Nekketsu Monogatari Advance
description: This is an obscure fan-made game demo made by "someone" in Japan.

name: Ms. Pac-Man Plus
description: Ms. Pac-Man must eat all the dots in a maze in order to advance to the next stage. She is chased by killer ghosts but she can eat them while powered-up after eating one of four large dots. Bonus points are awarded for eating the fruits and snacks that appear and wander the maze.

name: My Life with a Lonely Beauty
description: Experience a heartwarming journey in Japan as you, a rebellious high school student, flee your suffocating life and find refuge in the arms of Haruka Ichinose, a beautiful and troubled woman reeling from life's disappointments. Amidst fun-filled escapades and awkward moments, you'll witness yourself forming an unconventional family with Komari Yuuki, a diligent childhood friend torn between duty and empathy, and Akira Himuro, a cynical and rebellious classmate harboring secret feelings. As the four of you navigate your interconnected lives, will your presence mend their fractured souls or lead to unforeseen complications?

name: My Little Karaoke: Singing is Magic
description: My Little Karaoke: Singing is Magic is an unofficial My Little Pony karaoke game for Windows, Mac and Linux. The game features music from the Friendship is Magic series, alongside various fanmade songs from the community.

name: Skibidi Toilet Killer
description: You are the Cameraman. Go around the map and shoot down the Skibidi Toilets to finish the stage, or else they will defeat you.

name: Ghostbusters: Rise of the Ghost Lord - Full Containment Edition
description:
The Full Containment Edition of Ghostbusters: Rise of the Ghost Lord is set to include the first 6 months of DLC for the game.

The DLC currently includes 4 Equipment Skins, 10 Additional Playable Avatars, the Slimer Hunt feature and collectible with plans for more.

name: Metroid: Eternal
description:
A 2020 April Fools "update" to the critically acclaimed fangame 'AM2R: Return of Samus'.

After exterminating the Metroids, Metroid: Eternal follows Samus as she returns to SR-388 to eliminate the Septogg threat as well, on the Galactic Federation's orders. This title is played from an old-school arcade perspective, with quick reflexes, item collection and strategic reloading being the main focus of the game.

name: Around us: Zombie shooter
description: Around us: Zombie shooter is a multiplayer cooperative zombie shooting game. There are various kinds of zombies and bosses. A lot of weapons and upgrades are waiting for you to unlock via waves. Try to survive the highest wave that no one ever reaches!

name: Lunar Depot 38
description: Oh, no! Angels are pouring down from space, interfering with the creative process and also threatening to burst through this strange door... Better get out your fish gun and lend a hand!

name: Megami Tensei Gaiden: Shinyaku Last Bible II - Hajimari no Fukuin
description: Boy, be the light that illuminates the world. The gospel of the beginning rings out in the land covered with despair.

name: Combat Dungeon
description: Combat Dungeon is a seat-of-your-pants thrill-ride full of non-stop twitch-action combat. Conquer the dungeon! Duke it out with goblins! Call wizards on the phone! Vape with ghosts!

name: Perchance to Dream
description:
You awake after dreaming of a mysterious voice...but where are you?
Let's find out!

name: Frog
description: Try to get your frog from one side of the road, over the river and into your home.

name: Io Vuole Zen
description:
From balls to human being, from irony to despair.
The story of a life, the life of a hero.

name: Bomb Jack
description: In Bomb Jack, the player controls Jack, who must collect all the bombs in order to complete the current round and go onto the next one. This sounds easy, right? Wrong! Making Jack's task difficult are numerous enemies such as birds, mummies, turtles, and orbs. In each round, collecting a number of bombs results in a bonus coin appearing, and collecting this coin will make the player's score increase 2 to 4 times. More often than not, the "power ball" appears, and when you collect this, you can defeat enemies and have more time to collect all the bombs. There is also the "E" coin, which gives Jack one additional life, but rarely does this coin appear. The more you progress through the game, the more difficult it becomes, as enemies travel more quickly to get you.

name: Bomb Jack
description: The player controls Jack, a superhero who can leap and glide. Someone has planted 24 bombs at famous tourist sites (the Sphinx and Great Pyramids, the Acropolis, Neuschwanstein Castle in Bavaria, and two cityscapes resembling Miami Beach and Hollywood, which appear only as screen backgrounds rather than unique game locations). Jack must fly around the screen to collect the bombs. Each screen uses a different configuration of platforms upon which Jack may run and jump. Eventually, the levels reoccur a number of times with increasing difficulty. Jack "defuses" the bombs by simply touching them. As soon as he has touched the first, he triggers a sequence in which another bomb's fuse lights up, and so on. A player can score a bonus in each round by touching 20 or more bombs in the correct lit-fuse sequence. Jack may also defuse an unlit bomb by touching it, but this impedes his opportunity to score the bonus for that screen. It also delays the appearance of the game's bonuses and power-ups. The C64 conversion uses a cover of Jean-Michel Jarre's Magnetic Fields Pt. 2 as in-game music.

name: Bomb Jack
description: In Bomb Jack, the player controls Jack, who must collect all the bombs in order to complete the current round and go onto the next one.

name: Bomb Jack
description: In Bomb Jack, the player controls Jack, who must collect all the bombs in order to complete the current round and go onto the next one. This sounds easy, right? Wrong! There is also the "E" coin, which gives Jack one additional life, but rarely does this coin appear. The more you progress through the game, the more difficult it becomes, as enemies travel more quickly to get you.

More often than not, the "power ball" appears, and when you collect this, you can defeat enemies and have more time to collect all the bombs. There is also the "E" coin, which gives Jack one additional life, but rarely does this coin appear. The more you progress through the game, the more difficult it becomes, as enemies travel more quickly to get you.

name: Bomb Jack
description: In Bomb Jack, the player controls Jack, who must collect all the bombs in order to complete the current round and go onto the next one.

name: Bomb Jack
description: Bomb Jack is an arcade platform game that was released in 1984 by Tehkan (known today as Tecmo). It was followed by two official sequels, the console and computer title Mighty Bomb Jack, and the arcade game Bomb Jack Twin and Bomb Jack II, which was licensed for home computers only. The highest known score was by Mr G Jones from London: 6 746 800. Bomb Jack is a hero who can perform high jumps and float in the air. His goal is to collect all red bombs on the screen. The game's antagonists are enemies such as birds and mummies which, once they drop in the bottom of the screen, can morph into things like flying saucers and orbs that float around the screen, making Jack lose a life if he touches them. Collecting bombs will increase the bonus meter at the top of the screen (collecting lit bombs increases it more). When the meter is completely filled up, a circular bouncing "P" appears, and when collected, it will turn all the enemies into bonus coins for a short period during which Jack may collect them. Other similar bonuses are the B (Bonus) which increases the score multiplier (up to 5x), the E (Extra) which gives an extra life, and the rare S (Special), which awards a free game. There are five different screens in the game, each featuring a distinct scheme of platforms (the fifth has no platforms at all). There is a special bonus for collecting 21 or more lit bombs in a row, out of the 24 bombs of each round.

Collecting bombs will increase the bonus meter at the top of the screen (collecting lit bombs increases it more). When the meter is completely filled up, a circular bouncing "P" appears, and when collected, it will turn all the enemies into bonus coins for a short period during which Jack may collect them. Other similar bonuses are the B (Bonus) which increases the score multiplier (up to 5x), the E (Extra) which gives an extra life, and the rare S (Special), which awards a free game. There are five different screens in the game, each featuring a distinct scheme of platforms (the fifth has no platforms at all).
